message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it. However, I'm looking to spend a bit less. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $135?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still aiming for a price closer to $125. How about we split the difference and settle at $130?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. How about we try $132?
